sql: SELECT MIN(cn.name) AS movie_company, MIN(mi_idx.info) AS rating, MIN(t.title) AS western_violent_movie FROM company_name AS cn, company_type AS ct, info_type AS it1, info_type AS it2, keyword AS k, kind_type AS kt, movie_companies AS mc, movie_info AS mi, movie_info_idx AS mi_idx, movie_keyword AS mk, title AS t WHERE cn.country_code  != '[us]' AND it1.info  = 'countries' AND it2.info  = 'rating' AND k.keyword  in ('murder', 'murder-in-title', 'blood', 'violence') AND kt.kind  in ('movie', 'episode') AND mi.info IN ('Sweden', 'Norway', 'Germany', 'Denmark', 'Swedish', 'Danish', 'Norwegian', 'German', 'USA', 'American') AND mi_idx.info  < '8.5' AND t.production_year  > 2005 AND kt.id = t.kind_id AND t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = mc.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mk.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mc.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND k.id = mk.keyword_id AND it1.id = mi.info_type_id AND it2.id = mi_idx.info_type_id AND ct.id = mc.company_type_id AND cn.id = mc.company_id;
hint_str:
/*+ HashJoin(it2 mk mi_idx mc ct cn k mi it1 t kt)
 HashJoin(it2 mk mi_idx mc ct cn k mi it1 t)
 MergeJoin(it2 mk mi_idx mc ct cn k mi it1)
 MergeJoin(it2 mk mi_idx mc ct cn k mi)
 HashJoin(it2 mk mi_idx mc ct cn k)
 MergeJoin(it2 mk mi_idx mc ct cn)
 HashJoin(it2 mk mi_idx mc ct)
 MergeJoin(mk mi_idx mc ct)
 MergeJoin(mi_idx mc ct)
 HashJoin(mc ct)
 BitmapScan(it2)
 SeqScan(mk)
 SeqScan(mi_idx)
 BitmapScan(mc)
 BitmapScan(ct)
 TidScan(cn)
 BitmapScan(k)
 SeqScan(mi)
 IndexScan(it1)
 BitmapScan(t)
 BitmapScan(kt)
 Leading((((((((it2 (mk (mi_idx (mc ct)))) cn) k) mi) it1) t) kt)) */
